column5: Was in the park yesterday. Everything we saw was ice free, with a tiny amount of snow in the bush. A bit perpelexing why so much is closed.

From what I'm being told all backcountry permits are being issued as of today with some access roads being closed . The west side of the park still has some flooding and some snow issues on some access roads making them impassable . Advisories have been posted for this area of the park . Good luck all !!!
